Wilson_var[source]

Wilson_var(p, N, z=1.96)

Wilson estimator of binomial variance

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

Wald_var[source]

Wald_var(p, N)

Wald estimator of binomial variance (known issues, better use Wilson)
